proposal: Diving into the vibrant world of COLORAMA, where every shade tells a story, from LABIOS to UÑAS. 🎨 With 43 holders in the ETH network, you're painting the blockchain in bold strokes. Why not add a palette of B2B tools to your masterpiece? Imagine a DEX for your token or a lottery that's as fun as choosing the next shade. Let's mix our colors.
